item.title: By: Hoops
item.dc:creator: Hoops
item.description:
Goodness me, the pressure! Mine is a "true blog"!?
I would say that, yes, all of the above: bloggers are normal, geeky, and insular. Blogs and blogging are addictive! From a reader/lurker perspective, they are such a great way to keep in touch and share day to day/random musings that you wouldn't get in a phone call, snail mail, or email. From a blogger perspective, I've really enjoyed having the creative outlet. It's a reason to write again and with such pleasure--without deadlines and with complete control over content.
Finally, I think the bottom line really is where else could I write and you read about my toddler's puke? (Not sure who should be more embarssed about that one: Me for feeling the need to share it with the Internet or you for "enjoying" it!)
Thanks, Gordon (and Danika). Welcome to the blogosphere!
